"Let me explain what this is all about.": "Complete this test and you'll have permission to join the new Techter class."
"The Techter class was added because ARKS keeps on growing and we need to further differentiate our roles."
"Techters are similar to Forces, and they're not a new concept. In fact, Techters were once in wide use until ARKS membership started to dwindle."
"As for the details on Techter class abilities, you should probably just see for yourself after the test."
